trans-unit.source: Swap chain scaling and overlays
trans-unit.target: Swap chain scaling and overlays

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create scaled swap chains for faster rendering on mobile devices, and use overlay swap chains (when available) to increase the visual quality.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create scaled swap chains for faster rendering on mobile devices, and use overlay swap chains (when available) to increase the visual quality.

trans-unit.source: Swap chain scaling and overlays
trans-unit.target: Swap chain scaling and overlays

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create scaled swap chains for faster rendering on mobile devices, and use overlay swap chains (when available) to increase the visual quality.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create scaled swap chains for faster rendering on mobile devices, and use overlay swap chains (when available) to increase the visual quality.

trans-unit.source: Swap chains in DirectX 11.2
trans-unit.target: Swap chains in DirectX 11.2

trans-unit.source: Direct3D 11.2 allows you to create Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps with swap chains that are scaled up from non-native (reduced) resolutions, enabling faster fill rates.
trans-unit.target: Direct3D 11.2 allows you to create Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps with swap chains that are scaled up from non-native (reduced) resolutions, enabling faster fill rates.

trans-unit.source: Direct3D 11.2 also includes APIs for rendering with hardware overlays so that you can present a UI in another swap chain at native resolution.
trans-unit.target: Direct3D 11.2 also includes APIs for rendering with hardware overlays so that you can present a UI in another swap chain at native resolution.

trans-unit.source: This allows your game to draw UI at full native resolution while maintaining a high framerate, thereby making the best use of mobile devices and high DPI displays (such as 3840 by 2160).
trans-unit.target: This allows your game to draw UI at full native resolution while maintaining a high framerate, thereby making the best use of mobile devices and high DPI displays (such as 3840 by 2160).

trans-unit.source: This article explains how to use overlapping swap chains.
trans-unit.target: This article explains how to use overlapping swap chains.

trans-unit.source: Direct3D 11.2 also introduces a new feature for reduced latency with flip model swap chains.
trans-unit.target: Direct3D 11.2 also introduces a new feature for reduced latency with flip model swap chains.

trans-unit.source: See [Reduce latency with DXGI 1.3 swap chains](reduce-latency-with-dxgi-1-3-swap-chains.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Reduce latency with DXGI 1.3 swap chains](reduce-latency-with-dxgi-1-3-swap-chains.md).

trans-unit.source: Use swap chain scaling
trans-unit.target: Use swap chain scaling

trans-unit.source: When your game is running on downlevel hardware - or hardware optimized for power savings - it can be beneficial to render real-time game content at a lower resolution than the display is natively capable of.
trans-unit.target: When your game is running on downlevel hardware - or hardware optimized for power savings - it can be beneficial to render real-time game content at a lower resolution than the display is natively capable of.

trans-unit.source: To do this, the swap chain that is used for rendering game content must be smaller than the native resolution, or a subregion of the swapchain must be used.
trans-unit.target: To do this, the swap chain that is used for rendering game content must be smaller than the native resolution, or a subregion of the swapchain must be used.

trans-unit.source: First, create a swap chain at full native resolution.
trans-unit.target: First, create a swap chain at full native resolution.

trans-unit.source: Then, choose a subregion of the swap chain to scale up by setting the source size to a reduced resolution.
trans-unit.target: Then, choose a subregion of the swap chain to scale up by setting the source size to a reduced resolution.

trans-unit.source: The DX Foreground Swap Chains sample calculates a reduced size based on a percentage:
trans-unit.target: The DX Foreground Swap Chains sample calculates a reduced size based on a percentage:

trans-unit.source: Create a viewport to match the subregion of the swap chain.
trans-unit.target: Create a viewport to match the subregion of the swap chain.

trans-unit.source: If Direct2D is being used, the rotation transform needs to be adjusted to compensate for the source region.
trans-unit.target: If Direct2D is being used, the rotation transform needs to be adjusted to compensate for the source region.

trans-unit.source: Create a hardware overlay swap chain for UI elements
trans-unit.target: Create a hardware overlay swap chain for UI elements

trans-unit.source: When using swap chain scaling, there is an inherent disadvantage in that the UI is also scaled down, potentially making it blurry and harder to use.
trans-unit.target: When using swap chain scaling, there is an inherent disadvantage in that the UI is also scaled down, potentially making it blurry and harder to use.

trans-unit.source: On devices with hardware support for overlay swap chains, this problem is alleviated entirely by rendering the UI at native resolution in a swap chain that's separate from the real-time game content.
trans-unit.target: On devices with hardware support for overlay swap chains, this problem is alleviated entirely by rendering the UI at native resolution in a swap chain that's separate from the real-time game content.

trans-unit.source: Note that this technique applies only to [**CoreWindow**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208225) swap chains - it cannot be used with XAML interop.
trans-unit.target: Note that this technique applies only to [**CoreWindow**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br208225) swap chains - it cannot be used with XAML interop.

trans-unit.source: Use the following steps to create a foreground swap chain that uses hardware overlay capability.
trans-unit.target: Use the following steps to create a foreground swap chain that uses hardware overlay capability.

trans-unit.source: These steps are performed after first creating a swap chain for real-time game content as described above.
trans-unit.target: These steps are performed after first creating a swap chain for real-time game content as described above.

trans-unit.source: First, determine whether the DXGI adapter supports overlays.
trans-unit.target: First, determine whether the DXGI adapter supports overlays.

trans-unit.source: Get the DXGI output adapter from the swap chain:
trans-unit.target: Get the DXGI output adapter from the swap chain:

trans-unit.source: The DXGI adapter supports overlays if the output adapter returns True for [**SupportsOverlays**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dn280411).
trans-unit.target: The DXGI adapter supports overlays if the output adapter returns True for [**SupportsOverlays**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dn280411).

trans-unit.source: **Note** If the DXGI adapter supports overlays, continue to the next step.
trans-unit.target: **Note** If the DXGI adapter supports overlays, continue to the next step.

trans-unit.source: If the device does not support overlays, rendering with multiple swap chains will not be efficient.
trans-unit.target: If the device does not support overlays, rendering with multiple swap chains will not be efficient.

trans-unit.source: Instead, render the UI at reduced resolution in the same swap chain as real-time game content.
trans-unit.target: Instead, render the UI at reduced resolution in the same swap chain as real-time game content.

trans-unit.source: Create the foreground swap chain with [**IDXGIFactory2::CreateSwapChainForCoreWindow**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/hh404559).
trans-unit.target: Create the foreground swap chain with [**IDXGIFactory2::CreateSwapChainForCoreWindow**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/hh404559).

trans-unit.source: The following options must be set in the [**DXGI\_SWAP\_CHAIN\_DESC1**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/hh404528) supplied to the *pDesc* parameter:
trans-unit.target: The following options must be set in the [**DXGI\_SWAP\_CHAIN\_DESC1**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/hh404528) supplied to the *pDesc* parameter:

trans-unit.source: Specify the [**DXGI\_SWAP\_CHAIN\_FLAG\_FOREGROUND\_LAYER**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb173076) swap chain flag to indicate a foreground swap chain.
trans-unit.target: Specify the [**DXGI\_SWAP\_CHAIN\_FLAG\_FOREGROUND\_LAYER**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb173076) swap chain flag to indicate a foreground swap chain.

trans-unit.source: Use the [**DXGI\_ALPHA\_MODE\_PREMULTIPLIED**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/hh404496) alpha mode flag.
trans-unit.target: Use the [**DXGI\_ALPHA\_MODE\_PREMULTIPLIED**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/hh404496) alpha mode flag.

trans-unit.source: Foreground swap chains are always premultiplied.
trans-unit.target: Foreground swap chains are always premultiplied.

trans-unit.source: Set the [**DXGI\_SCALING\_NONE**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/hh404526) flag.
trans-unit.target: Set the [**DXGI\_SCALING\_NONE**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/hh404526) flag.

trans-unit.source: Foreground swap chains always run at native resolution.
trans-unit.target: Foreground swap chains always run at native resolution.

trans-unit.source: **Note** Set the [**DXGI\_SWAP\_CHAIN\_FLAG\_FOREGROUND\_LAYER**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb173076) again every time the swap chain is resized.
trans-unit.target: **Note** Set the [**DXGI\_SWAP\_CHAIN\_FLAG\_FOREGROUND\_LAYER**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb173076) again every time the swap chain is resized.

trans-unit.source: When two swap chains are being used, increase the maximum frame latency to 2 so that the DXGI adapter has time to present both swap chains simultaneously (within the same VSync interval).
trans-unit.target: When two swap chains are being used, increase the maximum frame latency to 2 so that the DXGI adapter has time to present both swap chains simultaneously (within the same VSync interval).

trans-unit.source: Foreground swap chains always use premultiplied alpha.
trans-unit.target: Foreground swap chains always use premultiplied alpha.

trans-unit.source: Each pixel's color values are expected to be already multiplied by the alpha value before the frame is presented.
trans-unit.target: Each pixel's color values are expected to be already multiplied by the alpha value before the frame is presented.

trans-unit.source: For example, a 100% white BGRA pixel at 50% alpha is set to (0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5).
trans-unit.target: For example, a 100% white BGRA pixel at 50% alpha is set to (0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5).

trans-unit.source: The alpha premultiplication step can be done in the output-merger stage by applying an app blend state (see [**ID3D11BlendState**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ff476349)) with the [**D3D11\_RENDER\_TARGET\_BLEND\_DESC**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ff476200) structure's **SrcBlend** field set to **D3D11\_SRC\_ALPHA**.
trans-unit.target: The alpha premultiplication step can be done in the output-merger stage by applying an app blend state (see [**ID3D11BlendState**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ff476349)) with the [**D3D11\_RENDER\_TARGET\_BLEND\_DESC**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ff476200) structure's **SrcBlend** field set to **D3D11\_SRC\_ALPHA**.

trans-unit.source: Assets with pre-multiplied alpha values can also be used.
trans-unit.target: Assets with pre-multiplied alpha values can also be used.

trans-unit.source: If the alpha premultiplication step is not done, colors on the foreground swap chain will be brighter than expected.
trans-unit.target: If the alpha premultiplication step is not done, colors on the foreground swap chain will be brighter than expected.

trans-unit.source: Depending on whether the foreground swap chain was created, the Direct2D drawing surface for UI elements might need be associated with the foreground swap chain.
trans-unit.target: Depending on whether the foreground swap chain was created, the Direct2D drawing surface for UI elements might need be associated with the foreground swap chain.

trans-unit.source: Creating render target views:
trans-unit.target: Creating render target views:

trans-unit.source: Creating the Direct2D drawing surface:
trans-unit.target: Creating the Direct2D drawing surface:

trans-unit.source: Present the foreground swap chain together with the scaled swap chain used for real-time game content.
trans-unit.target: Present the foreground swap chain together with the scaled swap chain used for real-time game content.

trans-unit.source: Since frame latency was set to 2 for both swap chains, DXGI can present them both within the same VSync interval.
trans-unit.target: Since frame latency was set to 2 for both swap chains, DXGI can present them both within the same VSync interval.
